intro: Psychotria obovatifolia, commonly known as the broad-leafed psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil, Colombia, and Peru. The plant is characterized by its ovate, glossy leaves and small, white to pale green flowers. It often grows in shaded, humid environments within tropical forests. Psychotria obovatifolia is sometimes used in traditional medicine, though its botanical properties are not as well studied as other members of its genus.
